Text.Value: We certainly will.
|DEBUG donate UI test.|
Let me see your wares.
I'm not seeing any. Do let me know if it turns up.
I'm not seeing any. Do let me know if it turns up.
I found the infernal iron you mentioned.
That thing isn't meant to operate outside Avernus. I'm not sure how much longer it'll keep running, the way it's going.
Certainly, if it's all right with you. Let me have a listen.
Leave.
I changed my mind. Perhaps you'd like to check out my infernal engine after all?
Phew! You really are burning up. Whoever put that engine together tried to house metallurgised demono-valves inside a ra-gnax alloy casement. Very risky.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dammon approaches Karlach and leans his ear toward her chest, trying to listen to her heart. We hear its fire burning, cogs grinding, etc. After a moment, Dammon jerks away, feeling the heat of her.

Text.Value: I'll be here.
Bring your friends if you've found some infernal iron. You shouldn't be alone, in case anything goes wrong.
Bring your friends if you want me to take a look at that engine after all. You shouldn't be alone, in case anything goes wrong.
You're back! Thank the gods. I feared the worst. If we both survive this horror, let's speak again - please.
Would you be able to take a look at Karlach's heart?
Leave.
Let me see your wares.
How fares the search?
I might be able to help, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.
I found the infernal iron you mentioned.
Thanks, Dammon. We'll keep our eyes open.
Hello again.
Thanks - I'll try to find some right away.
Maybe, but I'd need infernal iron. And a prayer that my hammer'll survive the work.

Synopsis: Follow up OM between Karlach and Dammon to give her her upgrades if she has infernal metal in her inventory.
